content: CI is currently broken due to a consistent failure in rustdoc-gui tests: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/94774#issuecomment-1063242196

@GuillaumeGomez if we don't have a fix soon, it may make sense to disable the rustdoc-gui tests - my impression is that they are typically not affected by most PRs anyway? We could re-add them once there's a fix for this spurious failure.
I already wrote one. I'm not sure what caused it though...
Hm. That seems pretty worrying, since it makes that test at least pretty slow -- but it's at least a fix
The GUI tests are run in parallel, so that shouldn't change much the overall run time. But maybe the problem is that they're run in parallel. Not sure...
